param.name: Sector
param.description: The sectorid of the watched sector

param.name: OBS Cue
param.comment: The cue name where the ship groups are saved too

param.name: OBS Cancel Cue
param.comment: The cue which is canceled after the OBS finishes

param.name: OBS Fleet Group Name
param.comment: The group name where all main ships are saved too

param.name: OBS Support Fleet Group Name
param.comment: The group name where all support ships are saved too

param.name: OBS Mother Ship Group Name
param.comment: The group name where all ships with owned ships are saved too

param.name: OBSFleetRace
param.comment: The maker race ID of the ships or the racemask 'default' or 'pirategroup'

param.name: OBSFleetPilotsRace
param.comment: The race ID of the pilots

param.name: OBS Points
param.comment: A fixed amount to use

param.name: OBSMissionRank
param.comment: A 0-30 scale preferably based on the players fight rank

param.name: OBSDifficultyRank
param.comment: A 1-8 scale of difficulty

param.name: OBSPosition
param.comment: how far away should the OBS ships be from FleetPositionObject

param.name: OBSSector
param.comment: The sector where the ships will spawn if OBSFleetPositionObject not set

param.name: OBSFleetRaceLogic
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if the created ships will have default race logic

param.name: OBSFleetPositionObject
param.comment: The object which will provide the location information

param.name: OBS Dock Support
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if the created support ships are docked with their homebase

param.name: OBS Support Overflow
param.comment: 0/1 Sets if additional support ships are created outside when the homebase is full

param.name: Reset Cue
param.comment: Cue to reset when finished

param.name: Sector
param.comment: The sectorid of the watched sector

param.comment: Cue to reset when finished
